channel.title: Won't let others join!
channel.description:
Hey guys, so i am currently making my own RSPS, which isn't going too well.... The problem is simple, but i can't seem to grasp the concept. So i have everything needed for a server to run and i have portfowarded and everything. I have a source and a client, after i upload my client so others can download it, nobody can log on my server. This is where I'm stuck at. How do i make it so people can go into my server. I've read some tutorials and guide that said i have to client.jar, which i have no clue what the hell they're saying. :confused: :( HELP PLEASE!!!
sincerely, Jay

item.title: Won't let others join!
item.dc:creator: @zygis227 zygis227
item.description:
@zygis227 wrote:

post your client link.

i started my rsps thing when i finally port forwarded i knew how to change ips client related things when i joined a server and got a mod status then i started learning.

Read full topic

item.title: Won't let others join!
item.dc:creator: @dwarvenknight dwarvenknight
item.description:
@dwarvenknight wrote:

^We all start somewhere.

Anyways you may not have portforwarded right (which isn’t client related) or not have the client connecting to your ip.

Read full topic

item.title: Won't let others join!
item.dc:creator: @i_code_rsps i code rsps
item.description:
@i_code_rsps wrote:

Word of advice if you can’t figure this out don’t make a server as it will go nowhere. I’d recommend learning java first.

Read full topic

item.title: Won't let others join!
